loginWindow Class Reference loginWindow
class sets ui and manages execution for validating username and password
#include <loginwindow.h>
Collaboration diagram for loginWindow:
Detailed Description
class sets ui and manages execution for validating username and password
loginWindow validates the credentials entered by the user, conncects to the database, and prompts the appropiate screen for the appropate user to execute after the user has been logged in and validated
The documentation for this class was generated from the following file: loginwindow.h
